cab.content: ty of From Secretary of State to Viceroy, Foreign Department, 2\lh December j 920. Priority A. 4295. Afghanistan. War Office call attention.'to telegram from Chief of GeneralStaff, India, X. 1880 of 8th December, as indicating that mission of Jemal Pasha toKabul may be primarily of military character. They are inclined to take seriousview of matter, and enquire whether you contemplate any special measures, to counteract Missions activities. Dobbs should be instructed to investigate questionso far as circumstances permit, and report his conclusions for transmission toHis Majesty's Government.
